```{r, projects, results='asis', echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(textreadr)
library(RCurl)

usernames <- read_csv("usernames.csv")
project <- "ggplot2"

for(usr in usernames$username){
  if(url.exists(paste0("https://github.com/staa566-csu/",project,"-",usr))){
    
    cat("### ",as.character(usernames[which(usernames$username==usr),"name"]), sep="")
    
    cat("\n- [repo](https://github.com/staa566-csu/",project,"-",usr,"), [ghpage](https://staa566-csu.github.io/",project,"-",usr,")", sep="")
    
    if(url.exists(paste0("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/staa566-csu/",project,"-",usr,"/main/README.md"))){
      cat("\n- ",read_html(paste0("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/staa566-csu/",project,"-",usr,"/main/README.md")), sep="")
    }    
  }
}
```
